articles.title: Fender Stratocaster
articles.description: Fender American Vintage II 1957 Stratocaster; electric guitar; body: Ash; neck: 1-Piece Maple; fingerboard: Maple; neck shape: 1957

articles.title: Fender Telecaster
articles.description: Body: Alder, Maple neck, Fretboard: Maple, Matte neck finish

articles.title: Gibson Les Paul
articles.description: Body: Mahogany, Cream-colored body binding, Top: Maple, Neck: Mahogany

articles.title: Gretch Electromatic
articles.description: Construction: Hollowbody with double cut, Body: Maple laminated with trestle block, Body depth: 57 mm (2.25) , Neck: Maple, Fretboard: Laurel

articles.title: Yamaha Piano
articles.description: 88 Keys, 3 Pedals (centre pedal: single-note sustain pedal), Length: 212 cm, Width: 154 cm, Height: 102 cm, Weight: 433 kg

articles.title: Kawai Piano
articles.description: Kawai K-300 AURES 2 E/P - piano with AURES 2 system, 88 keys, 3 pedals. exclusive Millennium III Upright Action with ABS-Carbon Composites, double delted hammers, Kawai headphone SH-9 included, Mahogany Core Hammers, dimensions: 122 x 149 x 61 cm. Weight: 227kg

articles.title: Blüthner Piano
articles.description: Colourful and continuous chamber music sound in all octave ranges. Technologically perfected Blüthner soundboard construction. Incomparable dynamics in terms of the modulation capacity of the tone and a quick repetition of the action make this piano the ideal partner for demanding musical study. Height: 116.5 cm - Width: 154 cm - Depth: 61.5 cm - Colour: White Polished - Piano bench and piano light included - Made in Germany

articles.title: Yamaha Genos
articles.description: 76 Velocity-sensitive keys with aftertouch. 1652 Sounds + 58 Drum / SFX Kits. 256 Voice polyphony. 550 Styles. 6 Continuous rotary knobs. 9 Sliders. 358 Preset DSPs, up to 28 insert DSP effects. Vocal harmony & synth Vocoder. Expansion Voice internal 1.8 GB

articles.title: Yamaha Violin
articles.description: Solid wood Guarneri model. Top: Solid spruce. Back: Solid, beautifully flamed maple back. Applied by hand, shaded oil-finish. Fingerboard: Ebony. Tuning pegs, chinrest and tailpiece: Boxwood

articles.title: Stentor Harlequin
articles.description: Solid spruce top. Maple sides. Solid tonewood base. Black stained hardwood fretboard. Pau Rosa pegs. Hardwood chin-rest. Light metal tailpiece with four fine-tuners. Case with reflectors and shoulder-strap. Colour: White. Includes case and bow

articles.title: Stentor Arcadia Antik
articles.description: Arcadia Antik model. Size: 4/4. Made by hand. Solid spruce top. Solid maple body. Heavily flamed. Pegs, fingerboard and chin rest made of ebony. Pirastro Tonica stringing. Antique finish

articles.title: Karl Höfner Violin
articles.description: Model H68HV-V. Size: 4/4. Built completely out of solid wood. Spruce top. Beautifully flamed maple back. Hand-applied lacquer in Italian style. Dominant strings. Incl. H90/517-V case and H7/13-V bow

articles.title: Millenium Focus Junior
articles.description: Focus Series. Suitable for children from 4 - 7 years and older. Drum shells feature a wrap finish. Muffling cushion for the bass drum. Colour: Black. Includes a drum throne

articles.title: Millenium Hybrid
articles.description: Complete Drum Kit. Studio configuration. 9-Ply poplar / birchwood shell. Shells with wrap finish. 1.5 mm metal hoops on snare and toms. Wooden hoops on bass drum in shell colour. Colour: Blue Lining.

articles.title: Millenium Focus 22 White
articles.description: Focus Series. Especially suitable for ambitious beginners. Drum shells feature a wrap finish. Muffling cushion for the bass drum and tom/snare sound control rings. Colour: White. Includes a drum throne

articles.title: Millenium Youngster
articles.description: Perfect for drummers as of 3 years old. Shell material: Hardwood. Black hardware. Drum shell with robust film finish. Colour: Green Sparkle
